Communication spaces allow access between departments and may include main hospital corridors (otherwise known as ‘streets’). This document replaces Volume 4 of Health Building Note 40 – ‘Common activity spaces’. Published 18 June 2007. Last updated 16 April 2013.

Title: Health Building Note 00-02: Sanitary spaces

Where this is the case, the reasons for the variations are discussed. Sections covering grabrails and semi-ambulant toilets have been reinstated, and the guidance on ‘changing rooms with toilet’ (and accompanying drawings) has now been replaced with a new section on the provision of a ‘Changing Places’ WC. Published 20 March 2013. Last updated 25 May 2016.
